# Preparations

## Set global options

```{r style, echo = T, results="asis", cache=FALSE, message = F}
#v.01
# Set knit global options
library("knitr")
options(digits = 2, width = 80)
golden_ratio <- (1 + sqrt(5)) / 2
opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE,
               tidy = FALSE,
               include = TRUE,
               fig.path = params$FIGPATH,
               dev=c("png",'pdf'),
               fig.height = 6,
               fig.width = 5 * golden_ratio,
               comment = '  ',
               dpi = 300,
               cache = FALSE)
library("rmarkdown")

# Pretty outputs
library("BiocStyle")
library("ggthemes") # add ggplot2 themes
library("ggplot2")
theme_set(theme_few(base_size = 14))

# Set seed for reproducibility
set.seed(13)
# Color blind friendly pallet



# Set output directory
d.out <- params$d.out
rm(params)
```

# Set variables

```{r}
pal <- c("#E69F00", "#56B4E9", "#009E73",
          "#F0E442", "#0072B2", "#D55E00", "#CC79A7", "#999999")[c(2,5,1,6,7,8)][c(1,2,3,5)]

order.col <- c("Dorsal forearm",
               "Volar forearm",
               "Antecubital fossa",
               "Forehead")
sites <- deseq %>% 
  select(Site, Cohort) %>% 
  unique %>% 
  mutate(names = abbreviate(paste0(Site,
                                   ".",
                                   str_sub(Cohort,1,1))) %>% make.names())


weights <- deseq %>% 
  select(rel.abundance, seqs, Site) %>% 
  unique()
```


# Prepare test sites

```{r}
q <-0.05
n.rep <- 100
beta.micro.env <- beta.micro.env %>% 
  group_by(term) %>% 
  mutate(sig = if_else(p.value < q,
                       1,
                       0)) %>% 
  summarise(significant.pc = sum(sig)*100/n.rep,
            R2.avg = mean(R2),
            R2.sd = sd(R2),
            n.rep = n(),
            n.avg = mean(n),
            n.sd = sd(n)) %>% 
  filter(term == "Microenvironment")

g.micro.env <- ggplot(beta.micro.env, aes(term, R2.avg)) +
  geom_col() +
  labs(y = "R2", x =  "") +
  coord_flip() + 
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = R2.avg - R2.sd, 
                    ymax = R2.avg + R2.sd), 
                width=.2,
                position=position_dodge(.9)) 
g.micro.env
```

# Proess ASV

```{r}
res <- deseq %>% 
  filter(padj < 0.05)
```

## Join results

```{r}
sites <- res %>% 
  select(Site, Cohort) %>% 
  unique %>% 
  mutate(names = abbreviate(paste0(Site,
                                   ".",
                                   str_sub(Cohort,1,1))) %>% make.names())

weights <- res %>% 
  select(rel.abundance, seqs, Site) %>% 
  unique()

df <- res %>%
  filter(Site == sites$Site[1]) %>% 
  select(seqs, Group, Description, log2FoldChange, lfcSE, stat, pvalue, padj) 

colnames(df) <- c("seqs", "Group", "Description", sites$names[1], 
                  paste0(sites$names[1], "_", "lfcSE"),
                  paste0(sites$names[1], "_", "stat"), 
                  paste0(sites$names[1], "_", "pvalue"),
                  paste0(sites$names[1], "_", "padj"))


for (i in 2:nrow(sites)){
  df.temp <- res %>%
  filter(Site == sites$Site[i]) %>% 
  select(seqs, Group, Description, log2FoldChange, lfcSE, stat, pvalue, padj) 
colnames(df.temp) <- c("seqs", "Group", "Description", sites$names[i], 
                  paste0(sites$names[i], "_", "lfcSE"),
                  paste0(sites$names[i], "_", "stat"), 
                  paste0(sites$names[i], "_", "pvalue"),
                  paste0(sites$names[i], "_", "padj"))
  
  
  df <- full_join(df,
                  df.temp,
                  by = c("seqs", "Group", "Description"))
  rm(df.temp)
}

```

## Add taxonomy

```{r}
df <- df %>%
  left_join(tax %>% select(seqs, everything()), by = "seqs")
```

## Format

```{r}
p <- df %>% 
  select(sites$names, Phylum, Family, Genus, Species,seqs, ASV, Group, Description) %>% 
  melt(id.vars = c("Phylum", "Genus", "Family", "Species","seqs", "ASV", "Group", "Description")) %>% 
  mutate(value = value %>% as.numeric())

se <- df %>% 
  select(paste0(sites$names, "_lfcSE"), Phylum, Family, Genus, Species,seqs, ASV, Group, Description) %>% 
  melt(id.vars = c("Phylum", "Genus", "Family", "Species","seqs", "ASV", "Group", "Description")) %>% 
  rename(se = value) %>% 
  mutate(se = se %>% as.numeric()) %>% 
  mutate(variable = str_replace(variable, "_lfcSE", ""))

to.plot <- full_join(p,se, by = c("Phylum", "Genus", "Family", "Species", "seqs", "ASV", "Group", "Description", "variable"))  %>%
  rename("names" = "variable") %>% 
  left_join(sites, by = "names") %>% 
  left_join(microenv, by =  "Site") %>% 
  filter((Site %in% sites$Site) & (!is.na(value))) %>% 
  mutate(Species = if_else(str_detect(Species, "(unc.)"),
                           Species,
                           paste0(Genus," ",Species))) %>%
  mutate(Species = gsub("\\(unc.\\)",  "", Species)) %>% 
  left_join(weights, by = c("Site", "seqs")) %>% 
  unique() %>% 
   mutate(Site = factor(Site,
                       levels = order.col))
```

# Select asvs to consider

```{r}
to.consider <- count(to.plot, ASV, Description) %>% 
  filter(n > 1) %>% 
  select(-n)

to.plot <- to.plot %>% 
  right_join(to.consider, by = c("ASV", "Description"))
```


# Overview

```{r, warning=F}
asvs.per.site <- to.plot %>% 
  mutate(Group = if_else(!Group %in% c("Diet", "Others", "Age/BMI/Sex"),
                         abbreviate(Group, dot = T),
                         Group)) %>% 
  mutate(Microenvironment = if_else(Microenvironment == "Sebaceous",
                                    "Seb.",
                                    Microenvironment)) %>% 
  group_by(Description, Site, Group, Microenvironment) %>% count()

g1.1 <- asvs.per.site %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Site, y = Description)) +
  geom_tile(aes(fill = n)) +
  ggpubr::rotate_x_text() +
  facet_grid(cols = vars(Microenvironment), rows = vars(Group), scales = "free", space = "free") +
  labs (fill = "ASVs (n)", y = "Factor") +
  theme(legend.position = "right") +
  scale_fill_continuous(breaks=seq(0,30,by= 5))
g1.1


asvs.per.site %>% 
  arrange(desc(n))

```

# General overview 

```{r}
top.associations <- to.plot %>% 
  mutate(presence = 1) %>% 
  group_by(Genus, Family, Phylum, Site) %>% 
  summarise(sum = sum(presence)) %>%
  mutate(weights = if_else(Site %in% c("Volar forearm",
                                       "Dorsal forearm"),
                           0.5,
                           1)) %>% 
  group_by(Genus, Family, Phylum) %>% 
  #get averages
  summarise(avg.per.microenvironemt = weighted.mean(sum, weights), sd.per.microenvironemt = sqrt(wtd.var(sum, weights))) %>% 
  arrange(desc(avg.per.microenvironemt)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>%
  top_n(n = 10, wt = avg.per.microenvironemt) %>% 
  mutate(Genus = factor(Genus, levels=unique(Genus))) 

g2 <- ggplot(top.associations, aes(x = Genus, y = avg.per.microenvironemt, fill = Phylum)) +
  geom_col() +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +
  ggpubr::rotate_x_text()+
  labs(y = "ASVs/microenvironment") +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom") +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=avg.per.microenvironemt-sd.per.microenvironemt, ymax=avg.per.microenvironemt+sd.per.microenvironemt), width=.2,
                position=position_dodge(.9)) +
  guides(fill=guide_legend(ncol=2))

g2
top.associations
```

# Plot ASVs

```{r, fig.width=16, fig.height=14}
to.plot.selected <- to.plot %>% 
 filter(Genus %in% c("Staphylococcus", "Corynebacterium", "Acinetobacter")) %>%
  mutate(Species = str_replace(Species, "Staphylococcus", "S.")) %>% 
  mutate(Species = str_replace(Species, "Corynebacterium", "C.")) %>% 
  mutate(Species = str_replace(Species, "Acinetobacter", "A.")) %>% 
  mutate(Species = paste(Species, ASV)) %>% 
  mutate(Genus = abbreviate(Genus, dot = T)) %>% 
  mutate(Site = factor(Site, levels = c("Dorsal forearm", "Volar forearm" ,
                                        "Antecubital fossa",
                                        "Forehead")))


this.plot <- to.plot.selected %>%
  filter(Group %in% c("Age/BMI/Sex")) %>% 
  mutate(Description = if_else(Description == "Sex",
                               "Sex (f:m)",
                               Description))
g3.1 <- ggplot(this.plot,
               aes(x = value, y = Species, label = Species)) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0, color="grey") +
  geom_point(aes(color = Site, 
                 size = rel.abundance), alpha = 0.8) +
  facet_grid(cols = vars(Description),rows = vars(Genus), scales = "free", space = "free_y") +
  labs(size = "Abun. (%)", x = "log2 fold change", y  = "ASVs") +
  theme(legend.position = "right") +
  guides(size=guide_legend(ncol=1), color = guide_legend(ncol=1)) +
  scale_color_manual(values = pal) +
  scale_size_continuous(breaks=seq(0,max(this.plot$rel.abundance),by= 2)) +
  ggpubr::rotate_x_text(angle = 45) +
  geom_errorbar(aes(xmin=value-se, xmax=value+se, color = Site),  width=.1)


this.plot <- to.plot.selected %>%
  filter(Group %in% c("Diet"))
g3.2 <- ggplot(this.plot,
               aes(x = value, y = Species, label = Species)) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0, color="grey") +
  geom_point(aes(color = Site, 
                 size = rel.abundance), alpha = 0.8) +
  facet_grid(cols = vars(Description),rows = vars(Genus), scales = "free", space = "free_y") +
  labs(size = "Abun. (%)", x = "log2 fold change", y  = "ASVs") +
  theme(legend.position = "right") +
  guides(size=guide_legend(ncol=1), color = guide_legend(ncol=1)) +
  scale_color_manual(values = pal) +
  scale_size_continuous(breaks=seq(0,max(this.plot$rel.abundance),by= 1)) +
  ggpubr::rotate_x_text(angle = 45) +
  geom_errorbar(aes(xmin=value-se, xmax=value+se, color = Site),  width=.1)




ggpubr::ggarrange(g3.1, g3.2, labels = "AUTO", nrow = 2, heights = c(10, 7))
```
